title: Senior Backend Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to design and optimize scalable APIs and distributed systems within our energy analytics platform.
requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in backend development
- Strong proficiency in Python or Go
- Experience with PostgreSQL and RESTful APIs
- Knowledge of cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
- Familiarity with microservices and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
responsibilities:
- Design, build, and maintain backend services
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement new features
- Optimize data pipelines for real-time analytics
- Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers
benefits:
- Competitive salary
- Remote flexibility
- Annual learning stipend
- Health and wellness coverage
- Stock options

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Nova Insights is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to build and deploy scalable ML pipelines powering our real-time predictive analytics platform.
requirements:
- 3+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning or data engineering
- Proficiency with Python and ML frameworks (TensorFlow or PyTorch)
- Experience with SQL and data warehouses (Snowflake, BigQuery)
- Understanding of model deployment and MLOps practices
- Familiarity with CI/CD and containerization
responsibilities:
- Develop, train, and optimize machine learning models
- Build scalable ETL pipelines and data preprocessing workflows
- Deploy models to production and monitor performance
- Work closely with product and data science teams to iterate on solutions
benefits:
- Flexible remote policy
- Equipment budget
- Professional development allowance
- Paid conference trips
- Performance bonus

title: DevOps Platform Engineer
description: Orion Cloud Systems is searching for a DevOps Platform Engineer to enhance and automate our CI/CD workflows while improving reliability across our cloud infrastructure.
requirements:
- 4+ years of experience in DevOps or SRE roles
- Strong experience with CI/CD tooling (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
- Proficiency with Terraform and Kubernetes
- Solid understanding of monitoring/alerting tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS or Azure)
responsibilities:
- Maintain and optimize cloud infrastructure using IaC
- Improve system reliability, scalability, and observability
- Automate deployment pipelines and streamline release processes
- Work closely with software teams to design resilient architectures
benefits:
- Hybrid work schedule
- Company-sponsored certifications
- 30 days paid vacation
- Private health insurance
- Annual performance bonus
